Class SystemRepository

Object
SystemRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
IApplicationRepo, IInternshipRepo, IRepository, IRequestRepo, IUser, Serializable
public class SystemRepository extends Object implements IRepository, Serializable
Class serve as Data base and contains all the system's data serve as single source of truth
